roleset.name: to involve, connect, or imply, connection or implying

example.name: implicate-v: transitive
example.text: The conversation was taped by federal investigators in what Mr. Lang said was an effort to get Mr. Lorin to implicate Mr. Laff .

example.name: implicate-v: passive
example.text: Capcom Futures is a Chicago subsidiary of Capcom Financial Services Ltd. , a London financial firm that was implicated last year in a scheme to launder drug money .

propbank.arg: in a scheme to launder drug money

example.name: implication-n
example.text: The case depended on his implication of his co - workers in the fraud .

roleset.note: IMPLICATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'implicate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from implicate.01-v predicate notes)
IMPLICATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with implicate.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from implication.01-n)
